name: World32 alpha1.4.1
description:
World32 is now an open-world game! The world has a size of (2^32 * 2^32) * 19 tiles (it's big!). You can discover the landscapes and build your own world!

The game is for free. Press only "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" above the "2.00$" line. But you can donate to advance the work :)

Changes:

-get 10 lifes for killing a wolf
-world selection arrow is showed
-can craft sticks
-crafting tutorial
-removed lava
-craft tile now with 1x rock instead of 2x rock
-generate mountain chance increased (15% instead of 10%)
-generate forest chance reduced (15% instead of 20%)

Control:

WASD - walk

LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN - dismantle

E - inventory / left inventory
